entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
WIDESPREAD FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

WIDESPREAD FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
